document.full_text: top u.s. defense officials said on wednesday there was no evidence pakistan's leadership was aware osama bin laden was in their country before a u.s. military raid killed him, and they cautioned against punitive action against islamabad over the incident.
document.title: no sign pakistan knew bin laden whereabouts: u.s.
lines_and_colors: top u.s. defense officials said on wednesday there was no evidence pakistan's leadership was aware osama bin laden was in their country before a u.s. military raid killed him, and they cautioned against punitive action against islamabad over the incident.
